this_title: Louise et la Légende du serpent à plumes
trans_title: 路易丝和羽毛蛇的传说
introduction: 10-year-old Louise has just moved to Mexico. When her lizard, Kéza, escapes, Louise goes looking for him and meets Arturo. Along with Luchador Diego, they pursue Kéza and allow him to be reincarnated as the Mexican God, Quetzalcoatl.
chinese_title: 路易丝和羽毛蛇的传说
foreign_title: Louise et la Légende du serpent à plumes
